query:
UPDATE orchestrator_jobs
                    SET
                        state = 'dead_letter',
                        lease_owner = NULL,
                        lease_id = NULL,
                        lease_expires_at = NULL,
                        updated_at = NOW(),
                        last_error = COALESCE(last_error, 'lease expired (max attempts)')
                    WHERE id = $1 AND state = 'leased'
